channel.title: Posts on Hugo Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo Website

item.title: Do correlations exist between musical artists and their followers on social media?
item.description: Introduction ## this is a comment $ echo this is a command this is a command ## edit the file $vi foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug :wq ## show it $ cat foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug $ Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme.
